tarot.title: Nine of Cups
tarot.desc: Life is good because you've worked diligently to make it so.

tarot.title: Ace of Pentacles
tarot.desc: This humble pentacle contains a multitude of possibilities. Your pentacle is a magic seed.

tarot.title: The Magician
tarot.desc: You are at the fullness of your power, poised to create reality in accordance with your desires.
